alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Monona; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 3:24AM CST until February 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Wind gusts 35 to 40 mph are possible and will cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Iowa and east central and northeast Nebraska. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
